::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer::

Zardus slams against the wall. He had not been expecting that. He ahd been 
planning on a quck shot in the back to take Serpentor out.

"Nemesis, FZ, DevilDuer: Intercept the snake. Don't let him escape!" He says 
into his comm link and runs down a hallway after Serpentor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ recieves Zardus' orders. He takes off running toward the exit (the 
alliance base has only one exit).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer runs out at an intersections on hallways and nearly crashes into 
Serpentor.

"YOU! The boss wants you dead!" He yells as he fires several shots at 
Serpentor's direction and runs after him.
